review.title: “Can pay well if you put up with everything”
review.pros: Pros – Good money, hired with little to no restaurant experience, if you do a good job the upper management will be good to you
review.cons: Cons – Owner tries to micromanage all of her restaurants which leads to many problems
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Hire managers to handle 1-3 set locations and begin opening new establishments outside of the 2 mile radius in downtown Columbia, SC (e.g. Charleston, Greenville, etc.)
